programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person Kobi Libii - Director Justice Smith - Aren David Alan Grier - Roger An-Li Bogan - Lizzie Drew Tarver - Jason Munt Aisha Hinds - Gabbard.

programme.title: Bean

programme.title: Chicago
programme.sub-title: Musical, Drama, Crime/detective, Music, Comedy, Arts And Culture ║ 2002 ║ 12
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical starring Catherine Zeta-Jones, Renée Zellweger and Richard Gere. In 1920s Chicago, chorus girl Roxie Hart shoots her lover and winds up in jail, believing her dreams of stardom are over. programme.title: 57 Seconds

programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. Unconventional speech therapist Lionel Logue is enlisted to help the future George VI find his voice - and despite Logue's disregard for all things stately, the two men form an unlikely bond Tom Hooper - Director Colin Firth - \Albert\, King George Vl Helena Bonham Carter - Queen Elizabeth Geoffrey Rush - Lionel Logue Guy Pearce - \David\, Edward Vlll Michael Gambon - King George V Timothy Spall - Winston Churchill Jennifer Ehle - Myrtle Logue Derek Jacobi - Archbishop Cosmo Lang Claire Bloom - Queen Mary Anthony Andrews - Stanley Baldwin Tim Downie - Duke of Gloucester Eve Best - Wallis Simpson Freya Wilson - Princess Elizabeth Ramona Marquez - Princess Margaret.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestselling novel by Dan Brown, starring Tom Hanks and Audrey Tautou. When the victim of a ritualised killing is discovered at the Louvre, French cryptographer Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon are called in to try to identify strange symbols cut into the body. programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on Dan Brown's forerunner to The Da Vinci Code, starring Tom Hanks and Ayelet Zurer. With the election of a new pope imminent, the Illuminati kidnap the four leading contenders and issue a coded message that they will murder the men and blow up the Vatican. Catholic leaders turn to Harvard symbolist Robert Langdon, who must put his uneasy relationship with the church hierarchy aside in an effort to crack the code and save the men's lives Ron Howard - Director Tom Hanks - Robert Langdon Ewan McGregor - Camerlengo Patrick McKenna Ayelet Zurer - Vittoria Vetra Stellan Skarsgård - Commander Richter Pierfrancesco Favino - Inspector Ernesto Olivetti Nikolaj Lie Kaas - Mr Gray / Assassin Armin Mueller-Stahl - Cardinal Strauss Thure Lindhardt - Chartrand David Pasquesi - Claudio Vincenzi Cosimo Fusco - Father Simeon.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: Action thriller directed by and starring Dev Patel. A nameless young man known only as Kid makes his living as a masked participant at a seedy underground fight club where he is beaten up regularly. But there is method in his madness, as he works toward exacting revenge against those responsible for his traumatic past Dev Patel - Director Dev Patel - Kid Sharlto Copley - Tiger Pitobash - Alphonso Vipin Sharma - Alpha Sikandar Kher - Rana Singh Sobhita Dhulipala - Sita Brahim Chab - King Kobra.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: Horror comedy starring Kelly Macdonald and Damian Lewis. Although they blend in with suburban middle-class society, Helen and Peter Radley are secretly abstinent vampires. programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey

Encouraged by the wizard Gandalf, Bilbo Baggins leaves the comfort of his home in the Shire to join a band of dwarves in their quest to reclaim the Kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug. programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. programme.title: Deep Sea
programme.desc: Shenxiu was abandoned by her mother when she was a child. Since then, she has bad dreams about a monster called Nightmare. One day, she travels on a cruise ship with her family. On a stormy night, she falls and breaks into the fancy Deep Sea restaurant. She meets the Chef, Nanhe, and embarks on a mysterious journey. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Brian Flaccus and Angela Malhotra Tian Xiaopeng - Director.

programme.desc: Bayliss and Pembleton work with Lennie Briscoe and Rey Curtis to find the people involved in the NYC subway bombing. (S4, ep 12).

programme.title: Homicide: Life On The Street

programme.title: Clijsters v Wozniacki 2009
programme.desc: Capping the mother of all comebacks, Kim Clijsters wins the 2009 US Open women's singles title by defeating Caroline Wozniacki after the the birth of her daughter.

programme.desc: With US Open title number six within reach, the Swiss maestro Roger Federer came up against a young Argentine by the name of Juan Martin del Potro in the final of the 2009 Grand Slam.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Berbatov
programme.desc: Sam Homewood, David May and Helen Evans travel to London to meet up with Cult United hero Dimitar Berbatov.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Kuszczak
programme.desc: The former United keeper opens up about the risks he took to get his dream move to Old Trafford, and what it was like working alongside Edwin van der Sar.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Rooney
programme.desc: United and England's record goalscorer looks back on his incredible years at Old Trafford; the trophies, the training sessions, the dressing room pranks - this episode has it all!

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Odion Ighalo
programme.desc: The Nigerian striker shares his incredible journey to Old Trafford. Odion also revealed how he used to save up his dinner money to pay to watch United play at weekends.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Danny Webber
programme.desc: Danny talks about his experience coming through the Manchester United Academy and the demands that Eric Harrison and Sir Alex Ferguson put on him at a young age.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Russell Beardsmore
programme.desc: We hear about Russell's pranks which (bravely) were usually at the expense of Sir Alex Ferguson. Watch to the end to find out what happened when he aimed a snowball at the boss.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Gary Bailey
programme.desc: The former United keeper dialled in to the Pod all the way from Miami Beach. He told us how he struggled to settle in to the dressing room at times and how it sometimes ended up in a fight.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Raimond
programme.desc: The former United keeper looks back on his time at Old Trafford and reveals the highs and lows of working alongside Peter Schmeichel.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Ji-Sung Park
programme.desc: Ji reflected fondly on his special years at United and his close relationship with the fans, but he requested them to stop singing his chant, which has offensive connotations to the people of Korea.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Luke Chadwick
programme.desc: Chaddy told us the hilarious reason for once missing a training session and the attempt at covering it up, which landed him in a web of lies with Sir Alex.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Schweinsteiger
programme.desc: Deutscher Fussballmeister spoke glowingly of United's interim manager, Ralf Rangnick, and midfielder Scott McTominay, whose talent stood out to Schweinsteiger when he was training with Reserves.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 1
programme.desc: The Pod team joined Jaap in his hometown of Zwolle in The Netherlands for an extended look through his playing and managerial career, where he revealed how he initially turned down Sir Alex Ferguson.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Stam - Part 2
programme.desc: Jaap talks us through his controversial exit from Manchester United, and reveals that there was an opportunity for him to return to Old Trafford in the seasons that followed.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Kieran Richardson
programme.desc: Kieran dispelled a rumour about a training incident with Roy Keane and revealed why he couldn't wait to retire when he reached his early 30s.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Mikael Silvestre
programme.desc: The former France international looked back on a glittering career at Old Trafford, and picked out some of his highligths from working with both Sir Alex Ferguson and later, Arsene Wenger at Arsenal.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: John Aston Jr
programme.desc: The former United winger reflected on the iconic night at Wembley, where he picked up the Man of the Match Award alongside his winners' medal.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Owen Hargreaves
programme.desc: Owen looked back on his time working with Sir Alex Ferguson, what went through his head before taking a penalty in the 2008 Champions League Final shootout and the details of his career-ending injury.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Ander Herrera
programme.desc: UTD Podcast co-hosts Helen Evans and Sam Homewood travelled to Bilbao, Spain, to catch up with Ander Herrera, whose honesty and passion led to one of our best-ever episodes.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Ella Toone
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Ella Toone. A devoted fan growing up, her dream of playing for the Reds seemed impossible but the inception of the women's side in 2018 changed all that.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Arsenal/Spurs 08
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Arsenal meet Tottenham Hotspur in the north London derby in 2008-09 season, in a match that saw a stunning comeback.

programme.title: Best of Wenger: Man U/Arsenal '98
programme.desc: Remember a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Arsenal visit Alex Ferguson's Manchester United at Old Trafford back in the 1997-98 season.

programme.title: EFL 98/99: Gillingham v Man City
programme.desc: Relive a classic match from the English Football League. Here, remember the thrilling 1998-99 Second Division play-off final between Gillingham and Manchester City at Wembley.

programme.title: EFL 98/99: Bolton v Watford
programme.desc: Relive a classic match from the English Football League. Here, Bolton Wanderers and Watford face off in the First Division play-off final at Wembley back in 1999.

programme.title: EFL 06/07: N. Forest v Yeovil
programme.desc: Relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Nottingham Forest face Yeovil in their Sky Bet League One play-off semi-final second leg at the City Ground in 2007.

programme.title: EFL 08/09: Cardiff v Swansea
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Cardiff City meet Swansea City in a thrilling south Wales derby at Ninian Park in 2009.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Liverpool/Chelsea 2001
programme.desc: Relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Liverpool play host to Chelsea at Anfield in the 2000-2001 season, with both sides battling for places in Europe near the season's end.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man City/Man Utd 2002
programme.desc: Relive one of the Premier League's great games. Here, Manchester City take on Manchester United back in 2002 in the last Manchester derby to be played at Maine Road.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Charlton/WHU '01
programme.desc: Relive one of the Premier League's great games. Here, Charlton Athletic take on West Ham United at The Valley in November 2001 in a pulsating encounter that went down to the wire.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Burnley/Man U 2009
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Burnley take on Manchester United at Turf Moor in August 2009 on what would be a memorable evening for the Clarets.

programme.title: Vamos! Garcia's Glory
programme.desc: A special programme looking back at Sergio Garcia's momentous Masters victory. In his 74th Major championship, and after coming so close so many times, Garcia finally triumphed at Augusta.

programme.title: Steel Magnolia: Willett's Masters
programme.desc: Relive all of the drama with a look at Danny Willett's 2016 Masters win. The Sheffield man took a stunning final-day victory to win his maiden green jacket.

programme.title: EFL 08/09: Millwall v Scunthorpe
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Millwall face Scunthorpe at Wembley Stadium in the League 1 play-off final in 2009.

programme.title: EFL 09/10: Sheff Utd v Sheff Weds
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Sheffield United and Sheffield Wednesday meet in a thrilling Steel City derby in September 2009.

programme.title: EFL 10/11: Peterborough v So'ton
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Peterborough and Southampton meet in an eight-goal thriller in League 1 in February 2011.

programme.title: EFL 12/13: Watford v Leicester
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Watford meet Leicester City in the famous second leg of their Championship play-off semi-final in May 2013.

programme.title: IPL'25: RR v RCB Hlts
programme.desc: Rajasthan Royals compete with Royal Challengers Bengaluru in the IPL. (13.04).

programme.title: NFL: Super Bowl LIX Highlights
programme.desc: Out to become the first team in history to win three consecutive Super Bowls, the Chiefs run it back to where it began in a rematch with Saquon Barkley's Philadelphia Eagles. (09.02).

programme.title: S/Lge: Hull KR v Wigan
programme.desc: Hull KR play host to Wigan Warriors in the Betfred Super League. Back to winning ways, the champions Wigan enter this contest following a bruising 54-0 win over Salford Red Devils.

programme.title: My Icon: Henni Goya
programme.desc: In the next episode of this special series, former professional golfer and broadcaster Henni Goya discusses the individuals that have inspired her during her life and career.

programme.title: Masters Final Round Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the fourth and final round of the 2025 Masters at Augusta National Golf Club. (13.04).

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2025 Joburg Ladies Open, a Ladies European Tour event taking place at the Modderfontein Golf Club. Swiss golfer Chiara Tamburlini won this event last year.

programme.title: EFL 13/14: Sheff Weds v Leeds Utd
programme.desc: Relive a classic match from the Football League. Here, Yorkshire rivals Sheffield Wednesday and Leeds United meet at Hillsborough in January 2014 in a memorable game for the Owls.

programme.title: EFL 13/14: Derby County v N.Forest
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic clash from the English Football League. Here, Derby County meet Nottingham Forest in the Sky Bet Championship.

programme.title: Bahrain F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: It's lights out for the 2025 Bahrain Grand Prix. Max Verstappen led a Red Bull one-two in the Sakhir season opener at Bahrain International Circuit last campaign. (13.04).

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man Utd/Man City
